meanings.definition: The action of sharing something out among a number of recipients.
meanings.sent1: The distributions of candies at the party made everyone happy.
meanings.sent2: The distributions of flyers for the event were done efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The distributions of hugs from the puppy were endless and heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The distributions of kindness in the community were like rays of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The distributions of smiles brightened up the room instantly.

meanings.definition: The way in which something is shared out among a group or spread out over an area.
meanings.sent1: The distributions of food at the picnic were fair and equal.
meanings.sent2: The distributions of resources in the village were carefully planned.
meanings.sent3: The distributions of laughter in the classroom were contagious and joyful.
meanings.sent4: The distributions of stars in the sky created a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent5: The distributions of colors in the painting were vibrant and eye-catching.

meanings.definition: The arrangement of a statistical data set in order of magnitude.
meanings.sent1: The distributions of test scores showed a clear pattern of performance.
meanings.sent2: The distributions of heights in the class formed a bell curve.
meanings.sent3: The distributions of shoe sizes in the store were surprisingly varied.
meanings.sent4: The distributions of temperatures across the region indicated a heatwave.
meanings.sent5: The distributions of votes in the election revealed a close competition.
